name: Unbound (Gene Normandia)
description:
Explore the vast outer space whilst trying to survive against its harsh environment and hostile inhabitants. Skillfully pilot your spaceship in order to deal with enemies and get necessary supplies in order to survive.

Credits:

Jonathan Ascaño  - Programmer / Game Designer

Samuel Baquir - Programmer / Sound Designer

Gene Normandia - Project Manager / Game Designer

Allen Rada - Artist / Programmer
